TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:May() filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED, EffectController() ) EffectController():ChooseTarget( NO_VALIDATION, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CREATURE_TO_PUT_INTO_HAND", EffectDC():Make_Targets(0) )
if EffectDC() ~= nil then local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:GuidedReveal( ZONE_GRAVEYARD , ZONE_HAND ) target:PutInHand() end end
